meanings.definition: Chuckawallas (noun): large, herbivorous lizards native to North America
meanings.sent1: The chuckawallas scurried across the desert rocks.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of chuckawallas sunbathing on the hot sand.
meanings.sent3: The chuckawallas had a picnic under the cactus shade.
meanings.sent4: The chuckawallas were like miniature dinosaurs roaming the arid land.
meanings.sent5: The colorful chuckawallas blended perfectly with the rocky terrain.

meanings.definition: Chuckawallas (verb): to chuckawallas is to bask in the sun for warmth and energy.
meanings.sent1: After a long hike, we decided to chuckawallas by the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The lizard chuckawallas on the highest rock to soak up the sun.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could chuckawallas all day like those lazy lizards.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she needed to chuckawallas in the sunlight to recharge her energy.
meanings.sent5: The cat loves to chuckawallas on the windowsill every morning.
